glsa.title: Pavuk: Digest authentication helper buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: Pavuk contains a bug that can allow an attacker to run arbitrary code.

background.p: Pavuk is web spider and website mirroring tool.

description.p: Pavuk contains several buffer overflow vulnerabilities in the code handling digest authentication.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a buffer overflow, leading to arbitrary code execution with the rights of the user running Pavuk.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are encouraged to upgrade to the latest available version of Pavuk.

resolution.p: All Pavuk users should upgrade to the latest version:
